      private java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> xLengthList

    • Field Detail

      • xPosList

        private java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> xPosList
        Each platform is basically an entry into each of these lists, for example platform 6 would be xPosList.get(6), yPosList.get(6), xLengthLisy.get(6) and yLengthList.get(6). those would be the values that define the platform 6.

        public void addPlatForm(int xPos,
               int yPos,
               int xLength,
               int yLength)
        Adds a platform to the list of platforms
        Parameters:
        xPos - this is the x position of the platform you are adding
        yPos - this is the y position of the platform you are adding
        xLength - this is the x length of the platform you are adding
        yLength - this is the y length of the platform you are adding
